oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Burning Memories - Ray Price performance - 1963-12-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Burning Memories, written by Mel Tillis and Wayne Walker, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on December 18, 1963 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, TN, released by Columbia on February 4, 1964, and performed by Ray Price (vocal), Jerry Kennedy (guitar), Grady Martin (guitar), Buddy Emmons (steel), Joseph Zinkan (bass), William Ackerman (drums), Tommy Jackson (fiddle), and Hargus Robbins (piano).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tillis, Mel; Walker, Wayne, 1925-1979; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; CBS Inc.; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Kennedy, Jerry, 1940-; Martin, Grady, 1929-; Emmons, Buddy; Zinkan, Joe; Jackson, Tommy; Robbins, Hargus
